divs: Sighting DetailsI have spent a considerable amount of time Researching the Roswell UFO Crash Site and have found it's location and obtained Satellite Images, Maps of the Location and Satellite Images of debris in the area. There will be a need to perform an extensive and expensive excavation of the area. The Air Force has given the go ahead on letting a Civillian Find it and Excavate it. Now that I have invested a tremendous amount of my own money on finding the object I am interested in being hired to Excavate it for what ever company is interested in paying me to continue and finish my work. I believe I have enough information to locate it now we just need to get together to begin it's excavation. Please contact me so that we can begin working on this project.
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Roswell
There were no other sightings in Roswell on or around July 4th 1947
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Researched and Discovered the Roswell UFO Space Craft Vehicle Crash Site by Satellite Image
